name: Financial Planner
description: A comprehensive financial management application that enables users to track expenses, set budgets, and visualize financial goals through interactive charts and analytics. Implemented with real-time data synchronization and secure user authentication.

name: WeebWear
description: An e-commerce platform prototype showcasing fitness apparel with unique designs. Features a responsive product catalog with dynamic filtering, interactive product displays, and a modern user interface built using Next.js and Zustand for state management.

name: Three.js Planets
description: A portfolio website built with Three.js, showcasing 3D models and animations. Features a responsive design and interactive elements built using React and Tailwind CSS.

name: Typescript Drawing
description: A simple drawing application built with TypeScript, HTML, and CSS. It allows users to draw shapes and lines on a canvas.

name: Event Discovery Platform
description: Created an intuitive event discovery application integrating the TicketMaster API, featuring real-time updates and interactive mapping capabilities.
